sentences.sContent: She began recalling a series of previous incarnations.
sentences.sCn: 她开始回想起种种前世化身。

words.tran: 化身的；人体化的；肉色的
体现；使…具体化；使实体化

trans.tranCn: 赋予肉体, 具人形, 化身
trans.tranOther: An incarnation is an instance of being alive on earth in a particular form. Some religions believe that people have several incarnations in different forms.
